[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: Arc<Module>] [Reference counting overflow] The loader returns Arc<Module> and Arc<Function> - can reference count overflows in long-running transactions or deeply nested calls cause memory unsafety? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: Arc<CompiledScript>] [Clone performance] Cloning Arc references (line 95, 101) - can excessive cloning in hot paths cause performance degradation that affects validator consensus participation? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Function: collect::<VMResult<Vec<_>>>()] [Unbounded vector growth] When collecting immediate dependencies into Vec (line 129), can an attacker craft scripts with thousands of dependencies causing memory exhaustion? (Medium)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Struct: EagerLoader] [Struct size] Is the EagerLoader struct size reasonable, or can having many concurrent loader instances consume excessive stack space causing overflow? (Low)

[File: third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/storage/loader/eager.rs] [Trait: ScriptLoader] [Multiple trait bounds] The ScriptLoader impl requires T to implement both ModuleStorage and ScriptCache - can conflicting implementations of these traits cause inconsistent behavior? (Medium)
